sentences.sContent: One of the most poignant sights awaiting visitors is the funfair, which was due to open just a few days before disaster struck.
sentences.sContent_eng: One of the most poignant sights awaiting visitors is the funfair, which was due to open just a few days before disaster struck.
sentences.sCn: 最能打动游客心弦的情景是一家游乐场，它原定几天后就要开放。

trans.tranOther: a noisy outdoor event where you can ride on machines, play games to win prizes etc
